lead_paragraph: The credit card issuer, which also lost several co-branding deals, said total revenue, net of interest expense, fell 2.7 percent to $7.95 billion.

headline.print_headline: Stronger Dollar Drives Revenue Down at American Express
headline.main: Stronger Dollar Drives Revenue Down at American Express

snippet: The credit card issuer, which also lost several co-branding deals, said total revenue, net of interest expense, fell 2.7 percent to $7.95 billion.
